CustomField.description: A summary of the STP Child Type
CustomField.formula: If (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'STP_Paid_Leave' , TEXT(tc9_eau__Leave_Type__c) , If (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'STP_Allowance' , TEXT(tc9_eau__Allowance_Type__c) + If (tc9_eau__Allowance_Other_Description__c != null , ' (' + tc9_eau__Allowance_Other_Description__c +')' , null ) , If (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'STP_Deduction' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'STP_Salary_Sacrifice' , TEXT(tc9_eau__STP_Deduction_Type__c) , If (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'STP_Lump_Sum' , TEXT(tc9_eau__Lump_Sum_Type__c) + If (NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(tc9_eau__Lump_Sum_A_Type__c))) , TEXT(tc9_eau__Lump_Sum_A_Type__c) , null) , If (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'STP_ETP' , TEXT(tc9_eau__ETP_Type__c) , null ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A summary of the STP Child Type
CustomField.label: STP Child Type
